text:
**<NVIDIA Optimus>** is a technology that allows an Intel integrated GPU and discrete NVIDIA GPU to be built into and accessed by a laptop.
**Notes**
- Nvidia Optimus is very delicate on Linux.
- As of October 2017, Arch linux and Ubuntu are the best distros for Nvidia Optimus devices. 
**Important Links:**
- <https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/NVIDIA_Optimus>
- <https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Bumblebee>
- <https://github.com/Witko/nvidia-xrun>
